title.label: please add support for 11inch iPadPro aspect ratio

content.label:
I bought this game today and wowww!!
this game is awesome but the only thing that annoyed me is the fact that it does not support my iPadPro aspect ratio and I was partially disappointed ,but the quality of the game is spectacular and the details are massive!!
If you would only add the support for my iPadPro , this definitely becomes my best mobile gaming experience. 
Hope you read my review.
thanks for your attentionüòÉ

So I‚Äôm a sad poor boy who can‚Äôt afford a pc but I‚Äôve watched streamers play this game and they can choose between the different specialists like sniper, assault, heavy, ect. You can‚Äôt do that in the mobile version. It didn‚Äôt bother me to much when I didn‚Äôt know that the pc version had an option to choose. The only reason I bring it up is because I recently started a new game and I HAVE 23 SUPPORT SOLDIERS for reference I have 25 soldiers in total. I know the game has been here for awhile and I doubt that A. Anyone will see this comment and B. If the developers did see it I doubt they would change it. I just wanted to vent about it

I didn‚Äôt jump into the XCOM swing when it first came out, but now I‚Äôm hooked. Fun tactical game that is unforgiving and no micro transactions. Easily a great way to spend 5 bucks. I‚Äôll buy the second game just because of how good this was!

title.label: Really fun. Cures the FF:tactics itch

content.label:
**Take-away**
This game is great, complex, has randomized elements, and can be as challenging as you desire. If you are in doubt, yo should try it. It is a long game, it is a good value.

General thoughts
This game is something I have been looking for for years. Really fun, tough choices and there will be losses and casualties. 
Some times the mobility and line of sight for shooting are difficult to get just right, but thankfully autosave can bring you back to the beginning of the turn. 
Long hours and a lot of fun with this game. There a features that spice up the replay ability of this game.
The finality of troops getting flanked and taken out is a gutting experience you can avoid on easier difficulty but is part of the excitement on replay. (Sgt. watanabe has been killed „ÉΩ(Ôø£–¥Ôø£;)„Éé)
Only real complaint is that some mechanics are not explained well in-game, like how MEC troops upgrade at a slower pace than human troops, or what the yellow enemy symbol means. Luckily online resources have all possible questions covered in full. I guess also that the RGN for dealing damage is set at the beginning of the turn, so if you have a 90% chance to hit someone you expertly flanked and it missed, loading a save won‚Äôt yield a different result. 

Gripes (these are insignificant)
As this is a port of the game, I know there won‚Äôt be any updates or changes, so no use in griping but I wish customizing was a little more extensive (gender, nationality, ability). Also it is annoying that it is nearly impossible to sneak up on enemies without ghost features, which means they get free movement and puts your troops on disadvantage. Also, the economy is a joke. Building a fighter ship cost almost as much as a singular laser weapon and a fraction of a plasma weapon. And financial support from countries as the world is being over taken to fund a dozen or so soldiers requires suspension of disbelief in extreme. Oh well
Please, update the game version for iPhone XR display. Its not very comfortable to play with a small resolution. But this game is great!
Not sure if it‚Äôs the new iOS, at some point in the second missions you can‚Äôt use the heavy guy anymore. Any button like Accept or Cancel doesn‚Äôt do anything
There should be automatic reload if you‚Äôre soldier are all out of ammo you‚Äôre soldiers will automatically reload make it happen

title.label: UPSCALE THE VISUALS TO NEW IPHONE DISPLAYS PLEASE!!!!

content.label: I love the game, but how are you gonna charge us $5 for a game that is outdated by 2+ years! Please update it ASAP so it can be visually pleasing while we play. üôèüèº
Can‚Äôt get off the roof once you get on it, so he‚Äôs stuck. Also how do you get back to the main menu. So many control problems. The two finger swipe did not work for getting down. Broken. Sad.
Can‚Äôt get past the first mission after the tutorial even on the easiest difficulty. My units keep getting one-shotted.

title.label: Started crashing after a couple weeks

content.label: Perfect console to phone game but crash needs to be fixed iPhone X

This game is truly a great on iOS. Tons of depth, great controls.  I sometimes spend up to an hour on a single mission, so there is a LOT of hours of gameplay in this one. Don‚Äôt be afraid to start on easy until you are comfortable with the mechanics.
There are a lot of 1 star reviews because the people who got this game don‚Äôt like strategy but people who do like strategy I definitely recommend it
The games is good at first. But after a little while. The game will not complete loading and then it resets back to the intro repeatedly.
Hello developer! Please update your game to fit on iphone x, xs, xr, 11, 11pro fullscreen.The game is awsome.Good graphics.give u 5 stars.

title.label: Lots of bugs, very very slow gameplay

content.label: Expect the game to freeze semi regularly. Expect to not be able to to load saved games. Be aware that you will spend more time waiting for the sequential animations to complete than you will playing the game.

This game crashes on the second mission on my IPhone 11 Max and also on my iPad Pro. I have informed 2K China and they say that they have logged it as a bug with the developers but that there is nothing that they can do. No Refund or credit, They have not put any notice on the AP store that this game does not work on new devices but THIS GAME DOES NOT WORK ON NEW DEVICES. YOU WILL NOT GET YOUR MONEY BACK AND SUPPORT WILL NOT HELP YOU. DO NOT BUY!!

If you love xcom just get this on mobile. This runs surprisingly well.. in fact, this runs better on my iPhone base then back when I used to play this on the PS3 which is baffling. Remember all the drastic frame rate drops every time a character moves? Don‚Äôt see it here. This game runs flawlessly and load times are insanely quick. 10/10 for me.

Such a great game. Every now an then the game crashes and you have to re-load. 

Multiplayer is not cross platform form.

Don‚Äôt bother playing multi player. Either crashes or some players use glitches to stall the game on your turn and you loose for not being able to even play your turn. Very frustrating. When you actually get a match though, a lot of fun. Just play multi player with friends.

title.label: Poor Quality, major bugs prevent progress.

content.label: The tutorial is horribly broken.  You can easily get into a position where any load of save game causes you to be unable to proceed.  The game tries to force you to select an enemy to shoot at but when there are no enemies on the screen you‚Äôre stuck in an infinite loop.   The QA on this game is pretty poor when you can‚Äôt even make it out of the tutorial.
The game plays good! It‚Äôs just that on my iPhone 11 can‚Äôt play in full screen.   Can you guys change that? That would be for a perfect review
Couldn‚Äôt get the sound to come on in iOS 13.5.1. Last update was more than 2 years ago. Unlikely this issue will be resolved.

While the game will load on my iPhone 11, the controls don‚Äôt always work. Restarting the game will not fix the issues. I have issues with going up and down floors and also cancelling or accepting an action.

On the bright side, it works on my iPad.

Controls that only work 10% of the time. Buggy camera angles. No way to cancel a bad move due to the controls. It‚Äôs just a hot pile of 
garbage for the IOS version.

XCOM on your phone, what a time to be alive! Only complaints are having to inch the camera around and sometimes messing up move orders like giving them while trying to scroll, but that's what save scum is for.

If you could zoom out and scroll around more easily, and not have the camera zooming back in when your soldier selection changes, would get a solid five stars -- but still great.

title.label: Outdated. Desperately needs update for iPad 11/12.9

content.label: Outdated, black bars and low resolution graphics. Needs update for IOS13 and ipad 11/12.9

title.label: Great counsel game that can be played anywhere

content.label: I love this game and it great to have mobile

This is really fun game. Fantastic turn based play that really makes you think! I only wish they would add operation slingshot and progeny to play on ipad as well that would really complete this game. My only complaint is that sometimes it appears like I‚Äôm moving soldiers to the top of an object then when I have them move they don‚Äôt go up, but along the ground. This of course has resulted in some pretty bad positioning for the soldiers.

title.label: Sad how good this could be

content.label:
Would be awesome if you didn‚Äôt get stuck in missions where u can‚Äôt select a target or proceed.  Disappointing for Firaxis especially.  Uninstalled.

Even if I‚Äôm mistaken and not clicking something I should...I‚Äôm in the tutorial mode and there ZERO INDICATION of what the ef to do next!  Stupid AF. Furthermore I‚Äôve never played XCOM and there should constant indicators what the hell is going on what I need to click.

This game is awesome honestly it has so much strategy and every decision changes the way you play. The game has many quality‚Äôs that so many games don‚Äôt have. It has realistic art and gameplay that makes the game look way better. Though when u abort a mission all your people that u sent are gone, dead. It is very annoying so I recommend you put a auto save so u can change what u did or keep the people you sent. Else this game would be perfect.

title.label: Best game on ipad by far.

content.label: Had my iPad for quite sometime now, Xcom is the best game and best bang for your buck you will get for ipad, no joke.  Game runs super smooth on my REGULAR iPad..you don't need a pro.. Xcom offers a full campaign mode with zero micro transaction, unlike other shovel wear mobile and tablet games and that along, for me makes it top tier! Its a blast to play,I highly recommend it!

title.label: Great, but I found a bug

content.label: I hope that you can fix this bug.  I killed an enemy with my sniper that has the ‚ÄòIn The Zone‚Äô trait.  The sniper was flanking the enemy so it shouldn‚Äôt have cost an action, but it instead ended the turn. If you can fix this than it would be perfect.

I loved xcom 2 on the ps4, so I thought this would scratch the itch for a mobile game. It looks like it offers the turn based combat I love, however the options seem to get stuck, where I can‚Äôt move a character, or set him to overwatch. I can hit confirm or cancel on the action and the game does nothing. I can‚Äôt even progress past the first mission because this happens and the game is just stuck. Hopefully they fix this so that I can enjoy the game, thank goodness it was so cheap.
My favorite thing is when you get AI allies in the fight, it adds immersion and role play. Will there be any XCOM 2 chosen? Or AI friendlys updates like when they assault a resistance ally base?
Excellent strategy game with high risk/reward situations that will keep you engaged. The learning curve is steep but fair.

There is not a doubt in my mind this an awesome game/series. On that end, I have no complaints. But it seems like there‚Äôs a total disregard for how technical this game is. This game being played strictly touch screen requires insane patience. You‚Äôre going to be spending a lot of time just correcting and adjusting. So sadly I don‚Äôt play this game currently. Please make this game controller compatible if you‚Äôre going to continue to sell it. The game is pricey enough so there‚Äôs not many excuses you have to make that adjustment. And if you don‚Äôt, you‚Äôre just gonna keep getting many complaints along the same category/ regrets in buying game. Please please please make this update and I‚Äôll happily change my rating.

As someone who played the original X-Com and almost every iteration of the game since, I have to say this one is amazing. The fact that it is a mobile game is even more remarkable. The game play and content are top notch. The only thing that lets you know your on a phone is the screen size and the lack of a mouse. Now said lack of mouse has caused some combatant movement that I did not intend, and a ‚Äúundo‚Äù option would be great, but that is really my only critique. (You can overcome the problem with slowing down and being extra careful with screen touches.) All in all, this is a great game and well worth the money.

Unplayable, game crashing bugs on current OS and hardware. Which is a shame, because it was a great game. Ideally it would be fixed, but it doesn‚Äôt seem likely after over 2 years have passed since the last update. This being the case, at least take the game off the App Store so you aren‚Äôt picking the pockets of your would be fans. Thanks!
On iphone 6s, downloaded, tried to open, black screen came up, crash. No picture or loading screen just sent me back to home screen.

name.label: This guy is a great reviewer

content.label: Combat can be a little tough with moving people around the board, but worth buying

It‚Äôs a good game but the only reason that it isn‚Äôt five is because I want it to be optimized for iPhone X even though that probably won‚Äôt happen I thought I would write a review anyways. Gun and challenging game though
Wont allow other apps to play audio so you cant listen to anything while playing this.

This is a great game trapped in a five-year-old mobile port. Looks bad, runs worse, full of bugs, and not a single update from the publisher in over two years. Disappointing for a supposedly ‚Äúpremium‚Äù release, although by now we really shouldn‚Äôt expect any better from 2K.
only one thing i am on a i phone XR and the game play screen is smaller than my screen any way to get that bigger

title.label: It charged me twice to pay for the game

content.label: I‚Äôm a big fan of the xcom series however, I just purchased the game and it charged me twice how do I get refunded back on the second payment?

Been playing for only a short time but this game is super buggy.  I‚Äôve already had two games ruined because the game wouldn‚Äôt let me move my assault after engaging run and gun, by preventing me from changing elevation (occasionally can‚Äôt go up), and by not able to consistently disable bombs/bomb timers.  And those are just the bugs I found in 30 min of playing.  

Seems like a faithful recreation of the PC version.  Too bad it appears to be unplayable.
Controls are extremely buggy. Gets trapped in loops and have to reinstall.

Love the game but just got iPhone 11 and the game is glitching a lot now on the newer phones. Would like them to update to run smooth. Or they can always come out with the second one if they are no longer updating the first one

title.label: Terrible game if you hate losing. Always.

content.label: It started off so well. I‚Äôm a huge fan of the concept of this game (maybe). Building facilities, upgrading soldiers, turn-based tactical strategy... yes, please. Missing three shots in a row with 80% chance to hit, then having my top ranked soldier get killed in the first enemy attack in two hits on easy mode... no, thank you. There is way too much prep time involved in this game to lose so easily. Maybe I just don‚Äôt like this TYPE of game. I think I like the idea of perma-death and the strategy and immersion it provides, but that‚Äôs the problem with this game, you invest a LOT and play very cautiously to AVOID having your best soldier killed only to have bad luck (or bad design) cause you to lose so easily. Sure, you can save your game anytime, but that seems like a poor game mechanic and misses the point anyway.

I played this on my 2015 iPad Air 2 and had very few issues. If I left it in the background for awhile it would need to reboot and I had a few crashes if other large apps were running in the background, but I think that‚Äôs because my iPad is old. 

It‚Äôs not the full PC experience but it is 100 times better than most games on iPad.
